text: Remco Torenbosch (born 1982, in Netherlands) is a visual artist. ==Biography == Remco Torenbosch took part in exhibitions and public events at: Kunsthalle Wien,Kunsthalle Wien: Remco Torenbosch Stedelijk Museum Amsterdam,Stedelijk Museum: Remco Torenbosch Kunsthaus Zurich, Centre d'art contemporain du parc Saint-Léger, L'Usine Genève, De Vleeshal Middelburg, GAMeC Bergamo, de Appel AmsterdamPrix de Rome 2013: Remco Torenbosch and Victoria and Albert Museum,Victoria and Albert Museum London: Remco Torenbosch. Torenbosch was short-listed for the Prix de Rome 2013 ==References== == External links == * Remco Torenbosch Category:Living people Category:1982 births Category:Berlin University of the Arts alumni Category:Dutch contemporary artists
title: Remco Torenbosch
